entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor 8 Render mode breaks migrations over 3rd party components. #53008
  • Auth For Blazor To Be One #53007
  • [Feature Request][ Blazor New API Security end points Please have better Linkage between new security api end points /login / logout etc storing of tokens and the Blazor Web App New Project Template #53006
  • SignalR throws error on interface type method parameters (both client and server side) #53001
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #52999
  • Perf improvement: mvc, updates #52997
  • Record metrics for user account activities #52996

Closed

  • MapIdentityApi IdentityUser requires email instead of username in .Net 8 RC1 #51122
    Discussions
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #53000
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #52990
  • Perf regression: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextWithFilter, updates #52998
  • Calling protected api from MainLayout.razor results in a loop, from an Azure AD Authenticated Blazor Wasm PWA #23363
    Planning: WebUI
  • Hot Reload (Blazor WASM) not working when Solution Configuration is not Debug #41867
    Backlog
  • Included .resx file throws error when containing project is referenced from other project (.NET 6) #48916
  • Asp.Net Core API controller memory leak repopend #45098 #48641
    Discussions

PullRequests

Updated

  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add endpoint metadata to developer exception page #52668
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • [release/8.0] Fix metrics duration and http.route tag with exception handling #52790
    Servicing-approved, pending-ci-rerun, area-hosting, 8.0.x
